page.title: 15Adult Opinions of Our Town
page.content:
We carried out a survey to ask people questions about Cinderford and the surrounding area. These are some of the answers gave. The main dislike is the sheep because they go and spoil the plants. If changes could be made it would be stopping the sheep roaming around. Most people like living here because it is quiet. When people are having conversations shopping crops up most. In the future people think that Cinderford will be a ghost town. People think Foresters are very kind people.
By Rachael Symonds.
